input: A P Reid Insurance Stores Inc Moncton 123-4567
description: Corporate suffix 'Inc' (99999 count) should force business classification
Name counts higher than business counts - should be residential
Road indicator 'Street' (99997 count) should help identify address
Corporate suffix 'LLC' and location word 'Downtown' (99996 count)
Business word 'Bakery' (3000 count) with address containing 'Ave' road indicator
Residential indicator 'Family' (99995 count) with road indicator 'Rd'
